1.title: Oh Balls...
1.plot: Jon, Rupert and Aditya, a trio of somewhat bizarre individuals are thrust into a situation where they are trapped in a barn facing off against several oncoming dragons overhead. This introductory episodes establishes that these three are wannabe dragon slayers, and are also terrible at what they're doing, their seemingly chosen prophet being an incompetent upper class fool, the mentor being a wise cracking Scott and the other being there for convenience. The three show high tension and disdain against one another as their situation becomes more apparent and thus more ...

2.title: Hi, My Name's Jon, and I'm a Dragon Slayer
2.plot: Continuing the Dragons series, Chapter 2 commences a week after the events of chapter 1, the trio have settled into Jon's home and take time in discussing how to effectively begin their quest they were set on by Death. Jon still proving as incompetent as ever. Aditya's story also becomes more apparent as her life begins to slowly unravel before us.

3.title: Insomnia and The Woods
3.plot: Chapter 3 of the Dragons Saga opens with the trio, Jon, Rupert and Aditya attempting to deal with another of the rogue dragons. However, after a successful murder the three experience bizarre, hellish circumstances. Jon is met by a mirror version of himself, a cruel, cynical and detestable copy. Aditya is taken to a riverside, where, after conversing with her ghost friend Marcus, she experiences a strange anomaly with a demanding voice and mysterious presence, who foretells of an impending doom for the trio. Rupert is taken to see an old friend from his mysterious ...

imdb.plot outline: Dragons follows the life of Jon Draco, a dragon slayer, set on a quest by Death, along with Rupert Baxter, the Scottish mentor with an unknown past and Aditya Graves, someone who's own life is an unexplained mystery. There story filled with comedy, drama and sheer tragedy.
imdb.title: Dragons
plot: _Dragons_ (qv) follows the life of Jon Draco, a dragon slayer, set on a quest by Death, along with Rupert Baxter, the Scottish mentor with an unknown past and Aditya Graves, someone who's own life is an unexplained mystery. There story filled with comedy, drama and sheer tragedy.
